page.title: 16LITTLEMILL SCHOOL
page.content: The school is a Primary school dealing with the first seven years of the children's education. During this time the aim of the school is to develop the child to the best that his or her abilities will allow with work that is appropriate to their age aptitude and ability. The school is not only interested in the academic development of the child but in the development of the whole person through social education and a growing awareness of the need to co-operate with others in everyday life. This side of development is very important in a small community to prepare the children for situations they may encounter in the larger world outside.
